titles.title: Palaeoclimate constraints on the impact of 2 °C anthropogenic warming and beyond

custom_metadata.assertion: In the version of this Review Article originally published, ref. 10 was mistakenly cited instead of ref. 107 at the end of the sentence: “This complexity of residual ice cover makes it likely that HTM warming was regional, rather than global, and its peak warmth thus had different timing in different locations.” In addition, for ref. 108, Scientific Reports was incorrectly given as the publication name; it should have been Scientific Data . These errors have now been corrected in the online versions.
The authors declare no competing interests.
